name: Reach the Horizon
description:
Created for GBJam10.
You crash landed on a deserted island. You're wounded, but stable.

Explore the land, gather plants and use combine them to heal and gain new abilities that open new paths. Experiment, find recipes, recover your strength to escape.

CONTROLS

Keyboard Keyboard MoveArrow keys WASD Dash (when able)X J InteractC K Pause / Options Enter Tab
